item.title: Visual Studio Code Learning Path and Recommended Resources
item.description: Learning Path for Visual Studio Code Step 1: Getting Started with Visual Studio Code Perhaps the best place to start learning about Visual Studio Code is the introduction to VS Code by James Q Quick. It also provides an introduction to Visual Studio Code Extensions as well as Emmet. Then to get a refresher and a slightly different view, watch Getting started with Visual Studio Code and Get started with VS Code Extensions by the VS Code team.
